wordGroup: political correctness 识时务；合时宜

sentences.en: They don't care at all about political correctness.
sentences.cn: 他们根本不在乎政治正确性。

sentences.en: The opinion was also whispered that my master was my father; but of the correctness of this opinion, I know nothing; the means of knowing was withheld from me.
sentences.cn: 也有人私下说，我的主人是我的父亲；但我不知道这个观点的正确性；我没有办法知道。

sentences.en: The correctness of this decision may be doubted.
sentences.cn: 此项决定是否正确值得怀疑。
